product_name: Club Ride Fuze Bike Shorts - Men's
long_description: Ride from trail to town in comfort and style in the men's Club Ride Fuze Bike Shorts with 2-way stretch and a removable inner chamois liner. Durable, abrasion-resistant fabric wicks moisture, dries quickly and offers UPF 30 sun protection. Seamless crotch gusset reduces friction and frees leg movement. Stretchy 4-panel liner briefs have a chamois for comfort on the bike. Side buckles let you fine-tune the fit. Club Ride Fuze Bike Shorts for men feature hand pockets and 1 zippered rear pocket.
short_description: Ride from trail to town in comfort and style in the men's Club Ride Fuze Bike Shorts with 2-way stretch and a removable inner chamois liner.
